text: "I Don't Know Why" also known as Don't Know Why I Love You is a 1969 song by Stevie Wonder. It was taken from his 10th studio album For Once in My Life. It went to number 39 in the United States, number 14 in the United Kingdom and number 20 in the Netherlands. It was covered by The Rolling Stones for their 1975 album Metamorphosis. title: I Don't Know Why
